route-finder.errors.gamePaused: Route finding is disabled while game is paused.
route-finder.errors.oldNameFound: It looks like you are running an old copy of this module (before it was renamed), please uninstall 'pathfinding'.
route-finder.snapToGrid.name: Snap Path To Grid
route-finder.snapToGrid.hint: Snap the end point of routes to the center of grids.
route-finder.friendlyBlocksFriendly.name: Friendly Tokens Block Friendly Tokens
route-finder.friendlyBlocksFriendly.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for friendly tokens through other friendly tokens.
route-finder.friendlyBlocksNeutral.name: Friendly Tokens Block Neutral Tokens
route-finder.friendlyBlocksNeutral.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for friendly tokens through neutral tokens.
route-finder.friendlyBlocksHostile.name: Friendly Tokens Block Hostile Tokens
route-finder.friendlyBlocksHostile.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for friendly tokens through hostile tokens.
route-finder.neutralBlocksFriendly.name: Neutral Tokens Block Friendly Tokens
route-finder.neutralBlocksFriendly.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for neutral tokens through friendly tokens.
route-finder.neutralBlocksNeutral.name: Neutral Tokens Block Neutral Tokens
route-finder.neutralBlocksNeutral.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for neutral tokens through other neutral tokens.
route-finder.neutralBlocksHostile.name: Neutral Tokens Block Hostile Tokens
route-finder.neutralBlocksHostile.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for neutral tokens through hostile tokens.
route-finder.hostileBlocksFriendly.name: Hostile Tokens Block Friendly Tokens
route-finder.hostileBlocksFriendly.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for hostile tokens through friendly tokens.
route-finder.hostileBlocksNeutral.name: Hostile Tokens Block Neutral Tokens
route-finder.hostileBlocksNeutral.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for hostile tokens through neutral tokens.
route-finder.hostileBlocksHostile.name: Hostile Tokens Block Hostile Tokens
route-finder.hostileBlocksHostile.hint: Tick to prevent finding routes for hostile tokens through other hostile tokens.
